summary: Provides a PyTorch implementation of a neural volume renderer for Neural Graphics Primitives (NGP). It orchestrates the forward rendering pipeline, including ray marching, density and color evaluation, shading, and iterative state updates to produce rendered images from 3D scene representations.
business_intent: Enables high‑quality, efficient 3D scene synthesis and view‑generation within multimodal AI applications, supporting tasks such as virtual reality, content creation, and advanced visual perception in the NeMo ecosystem.
